Trade/Device Name(s): i-STAT CHEM8+ cartridge with the i-STAT 1 System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for i-STAT CHEM8+ cartridge with the i-STAT 1 System for quantitative hematocrit measurement in arterial or venous whole blood at point of care or in clinical laboratory settings.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantification of hematocrit in arterial or venous whole blood in point of care or clinical laboratory settings to aid in determination and monitoring of total red cell volume status associated with conditions including anemia and erythrocytosis; not evaluated in neonates.
